com.battlebardgames.tinysui
Class UiElement

java.lang.Object
  com.battlebardgames.tinysui.UiElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<UiElement>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Button, Label, ListItem, RootUiElement, ScrollBar, ScrollPanel, TextBox, Window
public abstract class UiElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<UiElement>

Represents a UI element

Author:
Thomas Cashman, Keith Cummins

grabsFocus

public abstract UiElement grabsFocus(float mouseX,
                                     float mouseY)
Returns the UI element which has grabbed focus on mouse button release Can be this element or a child element

Parameters:
mouseX - Mouse X coordinate
mouseY - Mouse Y coordinate
Returns:
Null if no element has grabbed focus
